reference.title: Reference
reference.shortdesc: The reference provides reference topics for the that are available for .

section.title: The
section.p:
You can use the to perform the following tasks:
Create or update a message hub
Create or update a connection policy
Create or update a messaging policy
Create or update an endpoint
Configure cluster membership
Display the configuration details of a configuration object
Delete a configuration object
Display the status of an server Docker container The usage of the http:// prefix in the documentation of the and examples is for the purposes of the Beta program only.
